body:
Basically, how this game works is simple. First you put something like


If you were given 1 million dollars

and then you put something like this

Would you end your life at 33 


Then you reply to the person above you, saying yes or no.

Start off with

If you were given 1 million dollars
Would you end your life at 33?

title: [GAME] If.... would you.....

replies.body: By end your life do u mean suicide or retire from working??
replies.body_tagged: By end your life do u mean suicide or retire from working??
